author: Staff Reporter
text:
Arrested on

murder charge

A 40-year-old man was arrested for murdering his mother-in-law in Pennagaram on Thursday.

The accused, Velu, was involved in an altercation with his estranged wife at her mother’s house, when the victim, Jayakodi, intervened. According to the police, the couple had separated a year ago because of his alcohol addiction and Velu’s wife Deepa along with her three children was living with Jayakodi in Pennagaram.

On Thursday, Velu, in an inebriated condition,

went to Jayakodi’s

house and got into an altercation. He then bludgeoned Jayakodi with a stone, grievously injuring her. She succumbed to injuries in Salem government medical college hospital. The accused has been secured by the police.
title: Man arrested on murder charge
